content:
This PR has been approved and delegated to bors twice but failed each time and I am not sure how to fix this since I cannot reproduce the error locally. The error is here and says: 

error: ././././Mathlib/Algebra/Module/ZLattice/Basic.lean:322:9: typeclass instance problem is stuck, it is often due to metavariables

I don't see the error on Gitpod either.
I can still find the commit on that was on the staging branch, but the staging branch has since been replaced so the commit isn't currently on any branch now. I don't know if there's an easy way to fetch the commit and try to reproduce the error.
I think you might try to send it to bors again; if it's successfully merged then all is good, otherwise when the commit is on the staging branch you can check it out and see if the error can be repreoduced.

bors rebases commits onto master before they are merged, so maybe the error will pop up if you merge master again? (Apologies if you already did this... I may have overlooked a recent merge commit when I skimmed over the PR page just now)

Oh yes, I didn't notice this PR is 99 commits behind master. You can see this and merge master one-click if you have Refined GitHub in your browser.
image.png
Yes, sorry about that. I should have tried to merge with the latest version of Mathlib first to see if it builds. Let me try that now...
Ok, I can see the error now. Thanks for the help and sorry about the noise.
Xavier Roblot has marked this topic as resolved.
